thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ichor Holdings GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.54

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ichor Holdings GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.54
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Ichor Holdings Ltd:
* ICHOR HOLDINGS, LTD. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.70 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.54 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $240 MILLION TO $250 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $183 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.90 TO $0.97
* SEES Q1 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.69 TO $0.76 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.54 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.68, REVENUE VIEW $182.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.95, REVENUE VIEW $245.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
